subject: You appeared in 12 searches this week
body:
Hi there,

Your profile appeared in 12 searches this week. People are looking for candidates with your skills and experience.

Update your profile to stand out:
- Add your latest accomplishments
- Update your headline
- Request recommendations

Best regards,
The LinkedIn Team

subject: URGENT: Verify Your Account Within 24 Hours
body:
Dear Valued Customer,

We have detected unusual activity on your PayPal account. Your account has been temporarily limited.

You must verify your identity immediately to avoid permanent suspension.

CLICK HERE TO VERIFY: http://paypa1-verify.com/secure/login

Failure to verify within 24 hours will result in account closure.

PayPal Security Team

subject: Your Amazon.com order #112-8394857-1234567
body:
Hello,

Thank you for your order. Your order details:

Order #112-8394857-1234567
Wireless Mouse - Black
Quantity: 1
Total: $24.99

Estimated delivery: October 12, 2025

You can track your order at amazon.com/orders

Thanks for shopping with us!
Amazon.com

subject: Your order has been placed - Confirmation Required
body:
Dear Customer,

A new order has been placed on your account:

iPhone 15 Pro Max - $1,299.99
Shipping to: Unknown Address

If you did not make this purchase, click below immediately:
http://amaz0n-security.net/cancel-order

Your account will be charged in 2 hours if not cancelled.

Amazon Security

subject: Your pull request was merged
body:
Hi,

Your pull request #456 in repository 'user/project' has been merged by collaborator-name.

View the merged changes:
https://github.com/user/project/pull/456

Thanks,
GitHub

subject: Important: Update Your Direct Deposit Information
body:
Hello Employee,

Our payroll system is being upgraded. All employees must update their direct deposit information by end of day.

Click here to update: http://company-payroll-update.biz/login

Enter your employee ID and bank account details.

If not completed today, your next paycheck may be delayed.

HR Department

subject: Your Premium subscription payment
body:
Hi,

Your Spotify Premium subscription payment of $10.99 was successfully processed on October 8, 2025.

Next billing date: November 8, 2025

Manage your subscription: https://www.spotify.com/account

Enjoy your music!
Spotify

subject: Security Alert: Suspicious Sign-in Attempt Detected
body:
Dear User,

We detected a suspicious sign-in attempt to your Microsoft account from an unknown location.

Location: Nigeria
Device: Unknown

If this was not you, secure your account immediately:
http://micros0ft-security.com/verify

You have 6 hours to respond or your account will be permanently locked.

Microsoft Security

subject: Daily Crunch: AI startup raises $100M
body:
Good morning,

Here are today's top tech stories:

• AI startup raises $100M Series B
• Apple announces new product event
• Cybersecurity breach affects major retailer

Read more at: https://techcrunch.com/daily-crunch

Unsubscribe | Manage preferences

TechCrunch

subject: CONGRATULATIONS! You've Won $2,500,000
body:
DEAR LUCKY WINNER,

YOUR EMAIL HAS BEEN SELECTED IN OUR INTERNATIONAL LOTTERY DRAW!

PRIZE AMOUNT: $2,500,000 USD

To claim your prize, send the following:
- Full name
- Address
- Phone number
- Bank account details
- Processing fee of $500

Send to: claims@lottery-winner.xyz

You must respond within 48 hours or prize will be forfeited!

Congratulations,
Lottery Commission

subject: Sarah shared a document with you
body:
Hi,

Sarah Johnson shared 'Q4_Budget_Report.pdf' with you on Dropbox.

View file: https://www.dropbox.com/s/abc123/Q4_Budget_Report.pdf

This link will expire in 30 days.

Dropbox

subject: Your Account Has Been Locked - Action Required
body:
Dear Customer,

Your Bank of America account has been locked due to suspicious activity.

We need you to verify your identity:

1. Click here: http://bankofamerica-secure.net/verify
2. Enter your online banking credentials
3. Provide your SSN and card number
4. Answer security questions

Failure to complete verification within 24 hours will result in permanent account closure.

Bank of America Security Team
phishing_indicators: Suspicious domain (not official Bank of America domain)

subject: Your Netflix membership
body:
Hi,

Your Netflix membership will renew on October 15, 2025.

Plan: Premium (4 screens, Ultra HD)
Price: $19.99/month

Update your payment method or manage your plan:
https://www.netflix.com/YourAccount

Netflix

subject: URGENT: Need Gift Cards for Client
body:
Hello,

I'm in a meeting and need your help urgently. I need to send gift cards to an important client but I can't leave right now.

Can you purchase 10 x $100 Google Play gift cards and email me the codes? I'll reimburse you immediately.

This is time sensitive. Please handle ASAP.

Robert Williams
CEO

subject: Password reset requested
body:
Hi there,

You requested a password reset for your Slack workspace 'company-team'.

Reset your password: https://slack.com/reset/abc123xyz

This link expires in 1 hour.

If you didn't request this, you can safely ignore this email.

Slack

subject: Your Apple ID has been disabled
body:
Dear Apple Customer,

Your Apple ID has been disabled due to security concerns.

Reason: Multiple failed login attempts detected from different countries.

To restore access:
1. Visit: http://appleid-support.info/unlock
2. Enter your Apple ID and password
3. Provide credit card information for verification

Your ID will be permanently disabled if not resolved within 12 hours.

Apple Support Team

subject: Your tickets for Tech Conference 2025
body:
Hi,

Your registration is confirmed!

Event: Tech Conference 2025
Date: November 15, 2025
Location: Convention Center, San Francisco
Tickets: 2 x General Admission

View your tickets: https://www.eventbrite.com/e/tickets/123456

See you there!
Eventbrite

subject: Unusual Activity Detected on Your Account
body:
Dear Wells Fargo Customer,

We have detected the following suspicious transactions:
- $1,499.99 - Best Buy
- $899.00 - Apple Store
- $2,350.00 - International Wire Transfer

If you did not authorize these transactions, login immediately:
http://we11sfargo-security.com/disputes

Enter your username, password, and ATM PIN to file a dispute.

These charges will be finalized in 4 hours if no action is taken.

Wells Fargo Fraud Department

subject: You've been added to a workspace
body:
Hi,

John Smith added you to the 'Marketing Team' workspace on Notion.

Get started: https://www.notion.so/workspace/marketing-team

New to Notion? Check out our getting started guide:
https://www.notion.so/guides

Notion

subject: Complete KYC Verification - Withdraw Your $50,000
body:
Hello Investor,

Your crypto trading account shows a balance of $50,000 from recent market gains.

To withdraw your funds, complete KYC verification:

1. Upload your ID/passport
2. Provide SSN
3. Link your bank account
4. Pay $250 verification fee

Verify now: http://crypto-exchange.biz/kyc

Without verification, funds will be frozen after 48 hours.

Support Team

subject: Your receipt for trip to Downtown
body:
Hi,

Thanks for riding with Uber!

Trip details:
From: 123 Main St
To: Downtown Plaza
Date: October 8, 2025
Fare: $18.50

Payment method: Visa ****1234

View full receipt: https://www.uber.com/receipts/abc123

Uber

subject: Delivery Failure - Package #FX394827
body:
Dear Customer,

We attempted to deliver your package but no one was available.

Package: #FX394827
Attempts: 3
Status: Return to sender in 24 hours

To reschedule delivery, pay the $3.99 redelivery fee:
http://tracking-update.net/fedex/redeliver

Enter your credit card information to schedule redelivery.

FedEx Delivery Services

subject: Your Creative Cloud subscription renewal
body:
Hello,

Your Adobe Creative Cloud subscription has been renewed.

Plan: All Apps
Billing: $54.99/month
Next billing date: November 8, 2025

Manage your subscription: https://account.adobe.com

Adobe

subject: Tax Refund Notification - $2,847.00
body:
INTERNAL REVENUE SERVICE

Dear Taxpayer,

You are eligible for a tax refund of $2,847.00.

To receive your refund:
1. Click: http://irs-treasury.org/refund
2. Enter SSN and date of birth
3. Provide bank account for direct deposit
4. Pay $49.99 processing fee

Refund will be issued within 3-5 business days.

This notification expires in 72 hours.

Internal Revenue Service
Tax Refund Department

subject: New login from Windows PC
body:
Hi,

There was a new login to your Discord account:

Device: Windows PC
Location: Chicago, IL
Time: October 8, 2025 at 3:15 PM

If this was you, no action needed.

If this wasn't you, secure your account:
https://discord.com/account/security

Discord

subject: Re: Your inquiry about order #45893
body:
Dear Valued Customer,

Thank you for contacting us regarding your order.

To assist you better, please provide:
- Your full name
- Credit card number (for verification)
- CVV code
- Billing address

Reply to this email with the information above and we'll resolve your issue immediately.

Thank you,
Customer Service Team
phishing_indicators: Requests full credit card details including CVV

subject: Meeting invitation: Project Review
body:
Hi,

You've been invited to a Zoom meeting:

Topic: Project Review
Host: Jennifer Lee
Time: October 10, 2025 at 2:00 PM EST

Join meeting: https://zoom.us/j/1234567890
Meeting ID: 123 456 7890
Passcode: 987654

Zoom

subject: Document requires your signature
body:
Hello,

A confidential document has been shared with you and requires your electronic signature.

Document: Employment_Contract_Final.pdf
Shared by: HR Department

Click to review and sign:
http://document-share.xyz/sign?doc=8473829

Note: You must login with your work email credentials to access the document.

This link expires in 24 hours.

Document Management System
phishing_indicators: Credential harvesting attempt (requests work email login)

subject: Payment received - $125.00
body:
Hi,

You received a payment!

From: John Martinez
Amount: $125.00
Note: Consulting services
Date: October 8, 2025

The money has been deposited to your linked bank account.

View details: https://squareup.com/dashboard/payments

Square

subject: Fraud Alert: Confirm These Transactions
body:
FRAUD ALERT

We detected potentially fraudulent transactions on your account:

Transaction 1: $3,499.00 - Electronics Store
Transaction 2: $1,250.00 - Online Casino
Transaction 3: $890.00 - International Transfer

Did you authorize these transactions?

YES - Click here: http://yourbank-alert.com/confirm-yes
NO - Click here: http://yourbank-alert.com/confirm-no

You must respond within 1 hour or all transactions will be approved.

Bank Fraud Prevention Team
phishing_indicators: Uses scare tactics with fake transactions
